Reviews.Title: Rebel with a cause!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Black
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome! I have just started using it in the easy mode and the pictures look great! The quality is wonderful and it is easy to use. I am planning on reading about the more advanced features soon. I am also looking into photography classes. I bought this camera to capture photos of our new baby and now I am thinking of taking his monthly pictures rather than taking him to a professional.
